name: UISwitch.Style
desc: Styles that determine the appearance of the switch.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A style indicating that the system chooses the appearance of the switch according to the current user interface idiom.

items.name: case checkbox
items.desc: A style indicating that the switch appears as a Mac-style checkbox.

items.name: case sliding
items.desc: A style indicating that the switch appears as an on/off slider.
